name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry, Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, o/b/o Lynndon Hubler, Appellees, v. Wayne STUBER, Individually and d/b/a C-Wayne Fixtures, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry, Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, o/b/o Lynndon Hubler, Appellees, v. Wayne STUBER, Individually and d/b/a C-Wayne Fixtures, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of October, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, on the basis of the Commonwealth Court opinion, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Bureau of Labor Law Compliance v. Wayne Stuber, 822 A.2d 870 (Pa.Cmwlth.2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: F. Cortez Bell, III, Esq., Clearfield, for Wayne Stuber, individually and d/b/a C-Wayne Fixtures.
Kathryn J. McDermott, Esq., Harrisburg, for Bureau of Labor Law Compliance.
casebody.head_matter:
859 A.2d 1253
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry, Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, o/b/o Lynndon Hubler, Appellees, v. Wayne STUBER, Individually and d/b/a C-Wayne Fixtures, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 2004.
Decided Oct. 20, 2004.
F. Cortez Bell, III, Esq., Clearfield, for Wayne Stuber, individually and d/b/a C-Wayne Fixtures.
Kathryn J. McDermott, Esq., Harrisburg, for Bureau of Labor Law Compliance.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
